projects.title: Job Application Tracker
projects.summary: Created a Job Application Dashboard that allows users to track their job application. Features include a summary dashboard, dynamic table that allows for editing, and detailed view of each application.

projects.title: EaseCal
projects.summary: Created a prototype for restaurants and cafes to streamline shift-scheduling between employees and managers.

projects.title: Classifications of Soundscapes with Deep Learning Algorithm
projects.summary: Implemented convolutional neural network (CNN) architecture as a predictive model for soundscape affective responses.

projects.title: Video Summarisation in Surveillance and Security Systems
projects.summary: Experimented with existing convolutional neural networks on human activity recognition (HAR) with Tensorflow/Keras.

projects.title: Emissions from Rare-Earth (RE) Ions by the Energy Transfer from ZnO Nanocrystals Embedded in SiO2 Film
projects.summary: Proposed a new method of predicting the concentrations of Europium and Terbium ions needed for photoluminescence of white light with the use of MATLAB.

projects.title: Payroll Automation with Telegram Bot
projects.summary: Created a simple telegram bot as a personal project to keep track of the payroll.

projects.title: NUS Fintech Month 2022 Blockchain Hackathon
projects.summary: Proposed the creation of a decentralized NFT marketplace that provides the gateway to create universal NFTs that can exist across multiple-chains.
